secure_lid.description: Close the box lid by rotating it downwards to the closed position.

unchanged_lid_status.description: Keep the box lid in its open status without any change.

shut_rotation_lid.description: Push the lid of the box downwards into the closed position.

shut_lid.description: Shut the box lid by pivoting it on its hinge until it is in the closed status.

lid_status_unchanged.description: Keep the box lid in its current open status.

close_lid.description: Close the box lid by swinging it on its hinge until it reaches the closed position.

keep_lid_open.description: Maintain the box lid in its initial open position.

close_rotation_lid.description: Close the lid of the box by swinging it to the closed position.

lid_status_same.description: Maintain the current open status of the box lid without any change.

raise_lid.description: Raise the box lid by rotating it upwards into an open position.

keep_lid_closed.description: Preserve the lid's current closed status.

rend_open_lid.description: Rotate the lid upwards to an open position.

maintain_lid_closure.description: Maintain the lid in its initial closed position.

lift_lid.description: Lift the box lid by swinging it on its hinge to the upright position.

hold_closed_lid.description: Keep the box lid in its original closed status.

open_lid.description: Open the box lid by swinging it on its hinge to up position.

maintain_closed_lid.description: Maintain the box lid in its initial closed position.

open_rotation_lid.description: Open the lid of the box by swinging it to the open position.

stay_rotation_lid.description: The lid stays in the closed position.

rise_lid.description: Lift up the lid by swinging it to an open position.

lid_status_constant.description: Let the box lid remain closed without altering its status.

brush_lid.description: Brush the lid of the box to remove any dust.

clean_box_surface.description: Clean the whole box including the body and lid to remove dust or dirt.

clean_open_lid.description: Open the lid and then clean it to remove any dirt.

clean_closed_box.description: Close the lid and then clean the whole box.

wipe_lid.description: Swipe the box lid to ensure it is free of dust or grime.

clean_entire_box.description: Clean the entire box, including the box body and the lid.

open_clean_lid.description: Open the box lid and wipe it clean.

shut_wipe_box.description: Shut the box lid and wipe the entire box clean.

clean_box_lid.description: Wipe the box lid to ensure it is clean.

clean_box.description: Clean the surface of the entire box including the box body and the lid.

open_and_wipe_lid.description: Open the box lid and clean it.

close_and_wipe_box.description: Close the box lid and clean the whole box.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid of the box to remove any dirt or stains.

clean_box_body.description: Clean the body of the box to remove any dirt or dust.

clean_whole_box.description: Clean the entire box including the body and lid.

clean_body_and_lid.description: Thoroughly clean the entire box including the body and lid.

open_lid_clean.description: Open the box lid and clean it to remove any dust or particles.

clean_box_then_shut_lid.description: Clean the whole box first then close the box lid.
